Sentencas: Ca-loaded activated carbon is developed as fuel for direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs), operating without any carrier gas and liquid medium.
Titulo: A high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by Ca-loaded activated carbon

Sentencas: Ca is loaded on activated carbon through impregnation technique in the form of CaO, which exhibits excellent catalytic activity and significantly promotes the output performance of DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: A high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by Ca-loaded activated carbon

Sentencas: DC-SOFCs fueled by activated carbon with different Ca loading content (0, 1, 3, 5 and 7 wt. %)
Titulo: A high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by Ca-loaded activated carbon

Sentencas: are tested and the performances are compared with the DC-SOFC running on the conventional Fe-loaded activated carbon.
Titulo: A high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell fueled by Ca-loaded activated carbon

Sentencas: It is found that the performance of the DC-SOFC with 5 wt. % (373 mW cm(-2)) and 7 wt.
